snippet: Grounded whooping cranes can continue on their trip to Florida with a pilot as surrogate parent and guide.
abstract: Grounded whooping cranes can continue on their trip to Florida with a pilot as surrogate parent and guide.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Aviation Administration has relented and will allow pilots flying ultralight craft to finish a trip on which they are guiding whooping cranes from Wisconsin to their winter nesting grounds in Florida.

headline.main: Crane Migration Can Resume, F.A.A. Rules
